update metas
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
slug = #{slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},

parent = #{parent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
